title: RE60017: Environmental Testing %26 Reliability - Quick Facts
text:
RE60017
Course name | ENVIRONMENTAL TESTING & RELIABILITY
Offered by | Reliability Engineering Centre
Credits | 3
L-T-P | 3-0-0
Previous Year Grade Distribution
{{{grades}}}
Semester | {{{semester}}}

title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Failure caused due to environmental conditions; dry heat humidity, salt mist, rain, shock, bump, method of environmental stress screening (ESS), failure modes and their relationship with environmental stress models relating failure rate with environment stress, reliability demonstration through accelerated testing, burn-in procedure and its optimization. Reliability growth. Models of reliability growth.
